verses.text: \w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* so violently moved, \w and|strong="H1471"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* thoughts \w of|strong="H1471"\w* \w the|strong="H4100"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* so foolish?

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* taken \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w rulers|strong="H7336"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* fixed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* purpose, \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* selection, saying,

Let \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w chains|strong="H5688"\w* \w be|strong="H4480"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* taken \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w off|strong="H5423"\w* \w us|strong="H4480"\w*.

Then \w he|strong="H8064"\w* whose \w seat|strong="H3427"\w* \w is|strong="H0136"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* \w be|strong="H8064"\w* laughing: \w the|strong="H3427"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w will|strong="H8064"\w* make \w sport|strong="H7832"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* will \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w angry|strong="H0639"\w* words come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H0413"\w* ears, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w they|strong="H0639"\w* will be troubled:

\w But|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0589"\w* put \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* make clear \w the|strong="H0559"\w* Lord's decision: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w given|strong="H3205"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w being|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w request|strong="H7592"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w heritage|strong="H5159"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* farthest limits \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w under|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

They will \w be|strong="H3335"\w* ruled \w by|strong="H3627"\w* \w you|strong="H1270"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H3335"\w* \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*; they will \w be|strong="H3335"\w* broken like \w a|strong="H3335"\w* potter's \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w wise|strong="H7919"\w*, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*: \w take|strong="H3256"\w* \w his|strong="H8199"\w* teaching, \w you|strong="H3256"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Give \w worship|strong="H5647"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, kissing \w his|strong="H3068"\w* feet \w and|strong="H3068"\w* giving \w him|strong="H0853"\w* honour,

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w fear|strong="H6435"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0639"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w angry|strong="H0599"\w*, causing \w destruction|strong="H0006"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* come \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4592"\w* moved \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*. \w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w are|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* put \w their|strong="H3605"\w* faith \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.
